properties.name: preload.packageName
properties.description: 预加载包配置包名.多个包名请用逗号隔开

properties.name: banner.msg
properties.description: Boot程序启动默认输出信息

properties.name: request.timeout
properties.description: 过滤器中记录超时请求的时间（单位秒）  需要request.log 开启的情况下才生效

properties.name: request.log
properties.description: 是否开启过滤器中记录请求信息

properties.name: request.trimAll
properties.description: 是否开启强制过滤前后空格

properties.name: request.parameterXss
properties.description: 是否在过滤器中默认进行xss过滤 这样会对html标签等关键字进行转义

properties.name: request.urlDecode
properties.description: 是否在过滤器中 参数 url 解码

properties.name: interceptor.initPackageName
properties.description: 加载拦截器包配置包名.多个包名请用逗号隔开

properties.name: interceptor.resourceLocation
properties.description: 拦截器资源本地location 配置
